mapper.insert: INSERT INTO schedule (status, title, description, event_type, start_at, end_at, location, type, created_by) VALUES (#{status}, #{title}, #{description}, #{eventType}, #{startAt}, #{endAt}, #{location}, #{type}, #{createdBy})
mapper.select: SELECT schedule_id AS scheduleId, status, title, description, event_type AS eventType, start_at AS startAt, end_at AS endAt, location, type, created_by AS createdBy, created_at AS createdAt FROM schedule ORDER BY schedule_id DESC

SELECT schedule_id AS scheduleId, status, title, description, event_type AS eventType, start_at AS startAt, end_at AS endAt, location, type, created_by AS createdBy, created_at AS createdAt FROM schedule WHERE status = #{status} ORDER BY schedule_id DESC

SELECT s.schedule_id AS scheduleId, s.status, s.title, s.description, s.event_type AS eventType, s.start_at AS startAt, s.end_at AS endAt, s.location, s.type, s.created_by AS createdBy, s.created_at AS createdAt FROM schedule s WHERE s.status = #{status} AND ( -- PERSONAL: 내가 만든 것만 (s.type = 'PERSONAL' AND s.created_by = #{userId}) OR -- TEAM/COMPANY: 내가 참가자인 것만 (s.type IN ('TEAM', 'COMPANY') AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM schedule_participant sp WHERE sp.schedule_id = s.schedule_id AND sp.user_id = #{userId} )) ) ORDER BY s.schedule_id DESC

SELECT schedule_id AS scheduleId, status, title, description, event_type AS eventType, start_at AS startAt, end_at AS endAt, location, type, created_by AS createdBy, created_at AS createdAt, git_url AS gitUrl, file_storage_url AS fileStorageUrl FROM schedule WHERE schedule_id = #{scheduleId}
SELECT schedule_id AS scheduleId, git_url AS gitUrl, file_storage_url AS fileStorageUrl FROM schedule WHERE schedule_id = #{scheduleId}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM schedule WHERE status = 'DOING'

SELECT s.schedule_id AS scheduleId, s.title AS scheduleTitle, s.event_type AS eventType, s.start_at AS startAt, s.end_at AS endAt,
t.task_id AS taskId, t.personal_status AS taskStatus, t.task_description AS taskDescription FROM my_task t JOIN schedule s ON s.schedule_id = t.schedule_id WHERE t.user_id = #{userId} AND t.personal_status = #{status} AND s.status = 'DOING' ORDER BY s.start_at ASC, t.task_id DESC
